Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-33976 affecting package tensorflow for versions less than 2.11.1-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-33976 affecting package tensorflow for versions less than 2.11.1-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package tensorflow is earlier than 2.11.1-2, affected by CVE-2023-33976
